briefTitle: Assessment of Health Related Quality of Life in Women Who Underwent Breast Reconstruction After Radical Surgery
officialTitle: Assessment of Health Related Quality of Life in Women Who Underwent Breast Reconstruction After Radical Surgery (RMQOL)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Health related quality of life scores assessed by Breast Q questionnaire
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Normal Breast Checkup ( Mammography, echography and breast magnetic resonance imaging)in the previous 6 months
* French speaking and writing fluency
* Agree to participate after receive all information

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with an inability to complete HRQOL questionnaires (cognitive disorders, language barrier)
* Patient with a failed first breast reconstruction
